site_name: Land To The Rear Of The Red Lion Public House
decision_conditions: The proposed amendment to remove the word refuse from the development description of permission 180366FUL dated 20.01.2019, is considered to cause harm to the local amenity of the surrounding area, and is not consistent with the Protocol for Non-Material Amendments as it would alter the description and would create negative amenity impacts of the development.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to remove the word refuse from the description of development, in relation to planning permission reference 180366FUL dated 20.01.2019 for 'Construction of two pairs of semi-detached residential houses (a total of four) comprising ground and basement levels with private and communal amenity space at basement and ground level, landscaping, refuse and cycle storage'
